articles.author: Jason Gewirtz
articles.title: Thursday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session - CNBC
articles.description: A selloff in Oracle and other tech names dragged the S&P 500 to a fourth straight losing session on Wednesday.

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google releases Gemini 3 Flash, promising improved intelligence and efficiency - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google’s Gemini 3 family is now complete with release of Gemini 3 Flash.

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount’s hostile bid, calls offer ‘illusory’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Warner Bros. Discovery called Paramount's offer "illusory" and said that the company had misled shareholders about its financing.
articles.content: Warner Bros. Discovery’s (WBD) board of directors has rejected the $108 billion hostile takeover bid from David Ellisons Paramount Skydance, calling the offer “illusory,” and saying that Paramount ha… [+1059 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google’s vibe-coding tool Opal comes to Gemini - TechCrunch
articles.description: The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing users to create their own custom apps.
articles.content: Google’s vibe-coding tool, Opal, is making its way to Gemini. The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing … [+1602 chars]
